m_szDocSumamry: Japan set to miss hydrogen stations target for fuel-cell cars this year TOKYO, April 14 | By Maki Shiraki TOKYO, April 14 Japan looks set to miss its ambitious target of having around 100 hydrogen fuelling stations for fuel-cell cars in operation by March 2016, with just 76 approved after the deadline to apply for subsidies passed last month.
